DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two method assess patient pelvic organ prolapse occult stress urinary incontinence . Urodynamic test widely accept well-studied method diagnose occult stress urinary incontinence preoperatively , ambulatory pessary trial less expensive option available wider group practitioner evaluate patient engage daily activity .
DOC.criteria: Female Patients plan undergo pelvic organ prolapse surgery preoperative urodynamic testing within 6 month recruitment . Stage 2 great pelvic organ prolapse pre op POPQ exam Negative stress test clinical exam Cognitive capacity complete questionnaire void diary Stress incontinence provocative stress test preoperative exam . Occult stress urinary incontinence demonstrate preoperative physical exam Known ability retain pessary 3 day trial < age 18 History bladder augmentation artificial sphincter Known neurologic disease effect bladder ( spinal cord injury , Multiple Sclerosis , Parkinson 's Disease , etc . ) Non ambulatory patient Active infection vagina pelvis ( Pelvic inflammatory disease , infectious vaginitis , etc . ) Occult stress urinary incontinence demonstrate preoperative physical exam Known ability retain pessary 3 day trial < age 18 History bladder augmentation artificial sphincter Known neurologic disease effect bladder ( spinal cord injury , Multiple Sclerosis , Parkinson 's Disease , etc . ) Non ambulatory patient Active infr
